description:
# Description

The pirate's claw-some companion was a crab with a hook for a hand, making them the terror of the seas and the king and queen of crab cakes.

### Contributor

Sunflower Land is a community game built by a hundreds of developers and artists across the globe.
Come join us on [Github](https://github.com/sunflower-land/sunflower-land)
name: Crab Claw
